law.catch_line: A person that violates § 10-103(b) or (c), § 10-130, or § 10-133 of this subtitle is guilty of a ...
law.text: A person that violates § 10-103(b) or (c), § 10-130, or § 10-133 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both for each violation.
